item.title: PyPad 1.7.5-prerelease
item.description: - Hardened LSP go-to-definition client with timeout controls, retries, and optional verbose logging - Added server preference settings in UI for Python/JavaScript/TypeScript language servers - Improved Windows command parsing for quoted language-server paths with spaces - Added confirmed factory-reset option in Preferences (reset defaults and close app) - Added PySide6-native Scintilla compatibility engine for advanced editor fallback without PyQt/Qsci import switching - Expanded compatibility editor with folding, multi-caret/column editing, indicators/hotspots, and margin marker APIs - Detailed changelog: CHANGELOG.md
